bs-extjs-portal-config:
Title of configuration dialogues for dashboard portlets.

Followed by the name of the portlet, hence the colon. e.g. "Configure portlet: RSS feed"
bs-extjs-portal-count:
Label for input field that counts number of items shown.
{{Identical|Entry}}
bs-extjs-portal-timespan-alltime:
Label for timespan option "unlimited" ("entire period").
{{Identical|All time}}
